fields.label: Events Main Text
fields.name: events_main_text
fields.default_value:
The most important events in a person’s life are marked on our calendar. These are shown by a small
        yellow circle next to a particular date. When you hover your mouse over the yellow circle on the calendar,
        you will see what the event is and a brief description of it.
